summary.title: 8-Year Performance Summary (FY 2017–18 to FY 2024–25)
executive_summary: Adhunik Power & Natural Resources Ltd demonstrated consistent improvement over 8 years with operational efficiency, cost optimization, and a financial turnaround in FY 2024–25.
Losses steadily narrowed over the years, with a return to profitability supported by stable PLF and effective debt restructuring.

rows: Growth driven by demand and stability.

key_insights: Steady improvement in financial performance across all eight years.
Effective cost management, reduced finance costs, and improved fuel security.
Governance and compliance remained consistent throughout.
